PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8+ years of experience building backend-heavy, scalable platforms across cloud, healthcare, and industrial domains. Strong expertise in Node.js- and Python-based microservices, distributed systems, and event-driven architectures supporting transactional and stateful workflows. Proven background designing secure APIs, real-time data flows, and resilient services used by large internal and external user bases. Experienced collaborating closely with frontend teams to deliver interactive React-based applications backed by reliable backend systems. Hands-on contributor with strong ownership, system design skills, and a track record of mentoring engineers and driving engineering best practices.

Node.js, Python, REST APIs, Microservices Architecture, Event-Driven Systems, Pub/Sub Messaging, WebSockets, Distributed System Design
